panels.description:
Sum of all RAPL energy counters during the time period for concerned jobs/nodes.

WARNING: metric for the entire nodes. If your job is not exclusive on a node, measure is impacted by the other jobs on the same node.
panels.title: Total energy  (CPU & RAM only)
# jobs per node in the time period

panels.description:

WARNING: metric for the entire nodes. If your job is not exclusive on a node, measure is impacted by the other jobs on the same node.

# nodes per job in the time period
